item.title: Programming NXT with Enchanting
item.description:
NXT mindstorms are a product of Lego. They are motors and sensors that are controlled by an intelligent brick. The brick comes with NXT-G, a drag and drop style program made by Lego. Personally, I do not like NXT-G. There are a few programming alternatives.

Enchanting is a scratch based language that I have used to control my Mindstorms. Anyone who has used scratch might find Enchanting to be easier to use than NXT-G.

Here are a few programs able to control Mindstorms:

  • NXT-G
  • Enchanting
  • NXJ (Java based)
  • ICON (completely on brick)

item.title: Building Axels with Legos
item.description:
Axels are simple sometimes. But other times they are hard. They need to:

  • support the weight of the vehicle
  • turn
  • do other stuff

Here’s an example of what not to do:

You can tell it’s not good because the car wiggles. But you can stare at this next car as long as you like, and it will never wiggle.
